scripts.test:with-report: playwright test && npm run report:generate && npm run report:open
scripts.test:cart: npx playwright test tests/endToEndTests.spec.ts -g "simpleEndToEndTest" && npm run report:generate && npm run report:open
scripts.debug:cart: set PWDEBUG=1 && npx playwright test tests/endToEndTests.spec.ts -g "simpleEndToEndTest"
